data.persona: As a historian I love books. I need to know why things happened the way they did. Our history defines us as a culture.
data.description:
You are in the Nave.
There are rows of long brown wooden seats, a grey stone floor and transparent glass window panes depicting religious iconography.  There are also copies of religious literature available.
There's a window pane, a cross, and a grey stone floor here.
The preacher is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the cross to the preacher, because I want to talk to him.
data.mid_motivation: I want to spend the rest of the day discussing religious history with the preacher.
data.long_motivation: I want to learn all I can about religious history, so that I can finish my studies by next month.
